titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning the unity of the divine nature and the B. Trinity by John, Lord Archbishop of Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Aylmer ..., and W. Rogers ...,

notesStmt.note: This item can be found at reels 729:9 and 949:12.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Item at 949:12 incorrectly called T1255 in UMI Wing reel guide.
